casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 11, 2009

[Cite as 12/11/2009 Case Announcements, 2009-Ohio-6486.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-0995. Lasson v. Coleman.

Montgomery App. No. 22213, 2009-Ohio-1958. This cause came on for further consideration upon appellant’s motion to strike show cause order.

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
